title: GrudgeBook
description:
GrudgeBook: Track Your Conflicts, Gain Clarity

We all carry unresolved conflicts and emotional baggage. GrudgeBook is an offline platform designed to help you manage these emotions privately.

	•	Log grudges: Organize thoughts about those who’ve wronged you. Document events , add notes, and reflect on your emotions.
	•	Monitor progress: See how your feelings evolve over time and get insights into, conflicts are escalating or resolving.
	•	Private & secure: Keep your thoughts safe and offline.
